SEARCH
Package repository

Class MedicineRepository

java.lang.Object
repository.AbstractRepository<Medicine>
repository.GenericRepository<Medicine>
repository.MedicineRepository
public class MedicineRepository extends GenericRepository<Medicine>
Offers higher level functionality for the UI classes. However, doesn't handle exceptions yet

      Set the qty for which the alert fires
      Parameters:
      medicineId -
      newAlertLevel -
      Returns:
      True if success, false if medicine id does not exist.

    • dispense

      public boolean dispense(String medicineId, int qty)
      For pharmacists to dispense qty of a given medicine (and thus decrease its quantity).
      Parameters:
      medicineId - medicine name
      qty - qty to dispense
      Returns:
      True if the existing medicine quantity is at least equal to the specified qty. Otherwise, the medicine is NOT dispensed (and returns false). Returns false if medicine does not exist.

    • replenishAll
